title: Prospect Studio
description:
A comprehensive digital platform designed to streamline creative project management and client collaboration for design studios and creative agencies.

**Platform Features:**
- **Project Management**: Intuitive task tracking and milestone management for creative workflows
- **Client Portal**: Secure client access for project reviews, feedback, and approvals
- **Asset Management**: Centralized storage and organization for creative assets and brand materials
- **Time Tracking**: Built-in time tracking with detailed reporting for accurate project billing
- **Team Collaboration**: Real-time collaboration tools designed specifically for creative teams
- **Brand Guidelines**: Digital brand guide creation and management system

Prospect Studio transforms how creative teams manage projects, collaborate with clients, and deliver exceptional creative work on time and within budget.

media.caption: Clean, intuitive dashboard showing project overview and team activity
Streamlined client portal for project reviews and feedback collection
Comprehensive asset library with smart organization and search capabilities
